temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.paths
Class BFM<T>

java.lang.Object
  temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.paths.BFMBase
      temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.paths.BFM<T>

public class BFM<T>
extends BFMBase

Tarjan's subtree disassembly variant of the Bellman-Ford-Moore algorithm for generically attributed digraphs.

Constructor Detail

BFM

public BFM(Digraph g,
           Node source,
           EdgeSource<T> weights,
           NodeMap<T> distMap,
           NodeMap<Edge> predMap,
           NumAdaptor<T> adaptor)
Construct a new shortests paths finder for digraph with arbitrary edge weights.

Parameters:
g - the digraph in which to find shortests paths. This should be acyclic.
source - the vertex from which to find shortests paths. This may be null, in which case shortest paths from all the DFS roots are computed
distMap - a distance map giving distances to each vertex.
weights - a source of edge weights.
predMap - a map in which to place the predecessor edges of the shortests path tree for each vertex. This may be null, in which case a parent map is created and may be retrieved by the BFMBase.parents method.
adaptor - an adaptor for shortests paths for generic types.
See Also:
NumAdaptor.Int, NumAdaptor.Float, NumAdaptor.Long, NumAdaptor.Double
